caption.title: Temperature regional changes.
caption.p: Temperature changes due to soil moisture variability and soil moisture trend during a baseline (1971–2000) ( a, b) and a future modeled period (2056–2085) ( c, d). Stippling represents regions where at least three of the four models agree on the sign of the change. Latitudinal temperature plots accompany these subplots to show how the regional changes translate to a temperature change across latitudes. The thick lines in each represents the model mean while the shaded areas show the model spread.
